title: Local Hour: There’s Always A Point In Trying
description:
David Samson joins us for today's Local Hour and dives into Joe Burrow's concussion comments and the fallout over the NWSL abuse allegations. Draymond Green and Jordan Poole’s physical altercation leads David, Mike, and Witty to a discussion on Herschel Walker and how easy it has become to weaponize propaganda. Then, is Aubrey Plaza having a moment right now? Plus, Gonzalo Higuaín and Inter Miami have clinched a playoff spot!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
